short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quick and secure summary of your Apple's App Store purchase history.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Gain control over your App Store spending! Seamlessly summarize your purchases for a clear overview of your expenses. This Chrome extension offers a secure and user-friendly solution, allowing you to effortlessly monitor your App Store financial history.
